Beloved, think \w it|strong="G5613"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w strange|strong="G3581"\w* \w concerning|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w fiery|strong="G4451"\w* \w trial|strong="G3986"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w cometh|strong="G1096"\w* \w upon|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w prove|strong="G1096"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w though|strong="G5613"\w* \w a|strong="G1096"\w* \w strange|strong="G3581"\w* \w thing|strong="G3581"\w* \w happened|strong="G1096"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*:
